long_description: The Travel Chair Aluminum Teddy Chair has the same great features as the original Teddy Chair, but is even lighter-28.5% lighter to be exact! Made from ballistic nylon mesh and lightweight channeled aluminum, the chair is quick drying and travel friendly. Unlike solid fabric chairs, water won't puddle in the seat after a rain shower and it dries in minutes. Lightweight channeled aluminum saves weight over the original stainless-steel Teddy Chair. Height-adjustable armrests feature a mesh beverage holder, which can also be used for sunblock, sunglasses or other small items. Chair opens quickly from folded position for easy setup. Stainless-steel rivets and mildew-resistant nylon ensure reliable use in all weather. Comes with nylon carry bag with shoulder strap and drawcord closure.
short_description: The Travel Chair Aluminum Teddy Chair has the same great features as the original Teddy Chair, but is even lighter-28.5% lighter to be exact!
